title: Absolute Boyfriend
resume: When Xiao Fei orders a "love figure" she forgets to return him before her 3-day trial is over. Now stuck with a handsome, perfect android man, Xiao Fei must figure out how to pay off the payment and hide her embarrassingly beautiful secret.
